ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound thinly sliced rib-eye steak, chopped
½ (4 ounce) jar diced jalapeno peppers (Optional)
½ (4 ounce) jar diced pimento peppers (Optional)
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese (such as Philadelphia®), softened
1 (15 ounce) jar processed cheese sauce (such as Cheez Whiz®)

cookingTips: Cook the steak and onions until caramelized to develop deep flavor before adding cheeses
Keep dip warm in a slow cooker on low to maintain creamy texture and prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide on properly browning the steak and caramelizing onions. Explain how to melt cheeses smoothly without separation.
